content: --पर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} following that, coming after that, inferior. {2} having that as the highest object, closely intent on, exclusively devoted to, eagerly engaged in (usually in <ab>comp.</ab>); सम्राट् समाराधनतत्परोऽभूत् <ls>R. 2. 5</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 66</ls>; <ls>Me. 10</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 83</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 262.</ls> {3} diligent. (--रः the thirtieth part of a twinkling of the eye.
